long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that provides tagging and commenting features to organize and analyze your browsing history and websites.
This extension serves as a powerful tool for managing and utilizing Chrome's browsing history more effectively. Using tagging and commenting features, you can organize important web pages and easily find them later.
Key Features
ğŸ“ Page Tagging

Organize tags by categories
Move and merge tags via drag & drop
Filter history search by tags

ğŸ“ Commenting System

Add notes and comments to individual pages
Save selected text as comments via right-click
Easy comment editing and deletion

ğŸ“ Advanced Search & Filtering

Full-text search including tags and comments
Group by date, domain, and time period
Combine tags with AND/OR search operators for refined filtering

ğŸ“ Data Management

Import/export functionality for backups
Blacklist feature to hide unwanted sites

ğŸ“ User-Friendly Interface

Customizable category colors
Keyboard shortcuts for quick access

Benefits
Using this extension allows you to:

Keep important web pages organized without losing them
Quickly access needed information
Efficiently manage your browsing history

Enhance your browsing experience with intuitive tagging and commenting features by installing this extension today!
